termination), howsoever arising. (ee) "Seller Licensed Trademarks" means the Arizona Licensed Trademarks and the Diamond Licensed Trademarks. (ff) "Third Party" means any Person other than Arizona, the Company, and their respective Affiliates. (gg) "Trademarks" means any trademarks, service marks, trade names, trade dress, and other similar designations of source or origin, and registrations and applications for any of the foregoing.
